sentences.sContent: ...the discrepancy between press and radio reports.
sentences.sCn: …报刊报道与广播报道之间的差异。

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + crep(破裂) + ancy → 裂开 → 矛盾

words.tran: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的

trans.tranCn: 相差, 差异, 矛盾
trans.tranOther: If there is a discrepancy between two things that ought to be the same, there is a noticeable difference between them
